title: No excessive spam in main-chat
description: Spam includes: excessive caps and consecutive messages, gibberish that doesn't contribute to the current conversation, overuse of bots and images, and any other form of meaningless texts.

title: Keep it SFW.
description: Anything that wouldn't pass a PG-13 rating may be considered NSFW. Joking around about sexual topics is ok and even common here, but do not post NSFW media and go in depth on sexual topics.

title: No advertising or promotion.
description: This applies to ALL channels and any member's dms. I don't do partnerships unless it's for a good friend.

title: No bullying or harrasment
description: Don't harrass, dox, excessivly insult, or intentionally bully a member. Playing around is ok, but know when/if you are taking it too far

title: No self harm, suicide, or over the top depression talk
description: This server is generally a positive place and doesn't serve as a personal outlet(unless it's in vent)
